## Feature Description

A clear and concise description of the feature you'd like to see.

## Problem It Solves

Describe the problem this feature would solve. Ex: "I'm frustrated when [...]"

Describe how you envision this feature working.

## Alternatives Considered

What alternative solutions or features have you considered?

## Use Case

Describe a specific use case or scenario where this feature would be valuable.

Add any other context, mockups, or examples about the feature request here.
